Since there are directional enemies below me and considerable empty space surrounds me to the left and right, it would be prudent to reposition the avatar. Moving down may expose me to the enemy in row 3, but I could also look to interact safely with my cannon while keeping distance from enemies. 

I will choose to move left to (row = 6, col = 8). This allows me to avoid potential contact with enemies and gives me a better position to engage if enemies approach.

``` Action:1 ```
